favourite.article: Yes!!!! Lord restore my first Love to You. I am crazy in love with you. I depend on You always...
Lord, we want to be crazy lovers of Jesus!
Such a lovely song. I am a crazy lover of Jesus too. Praise the Lord!
Lord Jesus! We love You! Amen, Hallelujah!
Oh Lord! Thank You for blinding me towards all things! O Praise the Lord!
Lord, You just want to be loved. Make us a crazy lover of You! Amen.
Lord, I love You! Your church loves You crazily, come Lord Jesus!
Lord, cause me to love You more...make me crazy for You! Amen!
If only more of the Lord's people were crazy with love for Him and all His children. What a wonderful and unconventional song!
Lord I am crazy loving You!
Amen!! I am a crazy lover of Jesus too.
Jesus, only Jesus!
This music makes me touch the Lord with joy in my heart.
I love such a wonderful lyrics. No other things I need but to be filled with Jesus as life daily in my mortal body. Oh, Lord Jesus I love You. Hallelujah for Christ and church. Amen.
YES LORD WE'RE CRAZY LOVING YOU!! We're deeply in love with You. We just want to behold Thy glorious radiant face for eternity. Praise You Lord!
HALLELUJAH!!! LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU
When you see the preciousness of the Lord Jesus Christ, you can't just help it but go crazy loving Him. LORD JESUS I JUST LOVE YOU.
Lord, your sweetness, radiance, and beauty have captured meâ€¦ For I am a Crazy Lover of CHRIST!!!
I like this song.This song makes me feel happy. Praise the Lord!!!!!!!! How we need to give up the world and see only the LORD JESUS
Lord you're so sweet and attractive. Lord make me a crazy lover of YOU.Teach me to love You each day. I praise You Lord! (")
